order-picked-up.message: Your order has been picked up

order-on-the-way.message: Your order is on the way

charger-not-working.message: Hi, it looks likes your charger is not working. DO you want to find other chargin stations?

checked-in.message: You have succesfully checked-in to your stay!

checked-out.message: You have succesfully checked-out from your stay!

ALL_MESSAGES.session_cleared: Session cleared! You can start a new session now.
ALL_MESSAGES.session_and_profile_cleared: Session & profile cleared! You can start a new session now.
ALL_MESSAGES.route_selected: Your route has been actived. Here is the link to navigate : ${url}. What do you want to do next?
ALL_MESSAGES.request_in_progress: _Please wait while we process your request through open networks..._
ALL_MESSAGES.request_processed: _Your request is processed, generating a response..._
ALL_MESSAGES.request_failed: Request could not be processed. Do you want to try again?
ALL_MESSAGES.request_to_beckn_failed: Could not process this request. Can you please try something else?
ALL_MESSAGES.incident_on_road: ${message}. Please share your current location and I'll try to find some alternate routes?
ALL_MESSAGES.missing_source: Can you please specify the source location?
ALL_MESSAGES.missing_destination: Can you please specify the destination location?
ALL_MESSAGES.route_list_description: These are the various routes that you can take. Which one would you like to select?
